td.content: s:a 28 yo female unemployed presents with severe diarrhea, severe fever, severe cough and Respiratory. describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 4 years in her past she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 160 cm, Weight 43.9 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16, Sputum culture WBC present with gram positive diplococci, CBC WBC=12000 /mm3,Hgb=14 g/dL, Basic Metabolic Panel BUN=15 mg/dL,creatinine=0.8 mg/dL, rales Bil, mild rhonchi, crackles-LL, CTA-LL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = diffuse tenderness, BS (+), no hepatosplenomegaly, Skin = decreased tugor a:Pneumonia p:administered amoxicillin-clavulanate - 2 g 2 x day, performed Sputum culture, CBC, Basic Metabolic Panel, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:29 yo white f with C/O moderate retrosternal chest pain for 6 weeks that is frequent. pt also reports severe regurgitation, moderate heart burn. Patient is a moderate drinker she denies smoking o:Height 161 cm, Weight 45.1 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 16, Patient appears anxious a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Omeprazole - 20 mg po bid x 4 week, and ordered Ambulatory PH monitoring (24 Hrs).

s:pt presents with 6 weeks history of worsening severe fever, severe cough and severe diarrhea. she is a 29 yr old white f. she denies ever using cigarettes she consumes 2 drinks per night o:Height 160 cm, Weight 43.7 kg, Temperature 36.5 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 14, Sputum culture WBC present with gram positive diplococci, CBC WBC=12000 /mm3,Hgb=14 g/dL, Basic Metabolic Panel BUN=15 mg/dL,creatinine=0.8 mg/dL, rales Bil, mild rhonchi, crackles-LL, CTA-LL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = diffuse tenderness, BS (+), no hepatosplenomegaly, Skin = decreased tugor a:Pneumonia p:administered clarithromycin - 250 mg 2xday, performed Sputum culture, CBC, Basic Metabolic Panel, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
